title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: HS20001 HS20005 Course ContentsIntroduction to economic aspects of Project appraisal; Conceptual Foundations; Framework and Elements of Project Appraisal; Measurement of Costs and Benefits; Designing Stated Preference Studies to value Non-market Goods; Valuing Health and Safety Risks; Benefit Transfer; Objectives and Criteria of Economic and Financial Appraisal; Social Cost-Benefit Analysis; Valuing Benefits â Time, Life, Environment; Capital Budgeting â Discounting for time, risk and uncertainty; Application of Economic Appraisal Methods: Cost-Benefit Analysis, Multi-criteria Analysis and Framework Approaches; Case Studies.
